tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_forecasting_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
